name: Perplexity AI
about: An AI-powered research assistant that answers complex questions with concise, cited information.
summary: Find accurate answers fast, with reliable citations.
details: Perplexity combines search and large language models to deliver accurate, cited answers in real time. It helps users quickly understand complex topics using trustworthy sources.
howTo: Type a question into the Perplexity search bar.
Review the concise answer and view the cited sources.
Click a citation to read more from the original source.
Use follow-up questions to refine your research.
